content: this simple scarf is an ideal project for the beginner knitter bands of garter stitch frame a simple row of eyelets on a stocking stitch background just enough pattern to make this visually interesting but not enough to make it difficult also the garter stitch helps the scarf lie flat **finished size** approximately 6 5 x 80 inches instructions given for modifying dimensions for the matching mitts download the montgomery fingerless mitts pattern ***correction decrease 16 2010*** on page 2 it should read row 6-9 knit row 10 12 14 purl
